The Atmos-Fear-ic Garage of the Supernatural

Release date:
January 1, 1998

James's old number rating:

8/10

Video :

Bitchute Archive:

Old site description:

Because of work and school consuming all my free time and college coming the next year, I knew I had to call it quits for my annual haunted house tour. I kept it a Halloween tradition from 1993 to 1998, but now I was becoming an adult and I was too busy to put all my time into it. This is why I made a video tour of the last one to preserve the memory.

James's old ratings:

Back in 2003 James included star ratings with each film he listed on his filmography on his website.

Later on he switched to ratings out of ten.

Eventually, he dropped the ratings entirely.

This archive is unoffical and run by a fan of Cinemassacre. Contact the Archivist
